news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Insurance Law Center
news.description: As a driver, a homeowner, or a patient, a consumer may want to get various forms of insurance. Unfortunately, this industry can be as confusing as it is critical. The Insurance Law Center at Justia aims to shed some light on its rules.
